```{r}
library(lme4)

# 数学空模型
m0_math <- lmer(pv1math ~ 1 + (1 | cntschid), data = pisa_dat)
summary(m0_math)

mlmhelpr::icc(m0_math)
mlmhelpr::design_effect(m0_math)

```

```{r}
m1_math <- lmer(
  pv1math ~ st004d01t + age + immig_recode + workpay_recode + misssc +
             bsmj + relatst + learres + famsupsl + hisei + homepos +
             icthome + ictout + ictwkdy + icteffic + ictenq + ictfeed +
             (1 | cntschid), 
  data = pisa_dat
)
summary(m1_math)

```
